content: विचल् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To shake, tremble, move; पतति पतत्रे विचलति पत्रे शंकितभवदुपयानं <ls>Gīt. 5.</ls> {@--2@} To go, proceed, set out. {@--3@} To be agitated or disturbed, be rough (as the sea); व्यचालीदंभसां पतिः <ls>Bk. 15. 70.</ls> {@--4@} To deviate, swerve; <ls>Y. 1. 358.</ls> {@--5@} To fall off or down. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To shake, move, wave, {@--2@} To cause to swerve, lead away from. {@--3@} To excite, agitate, stir up. {@--4@} To destroy, rescind, annul.
